definition: profane or obscene expression usually of surprise or anger, to utter obscenities or profanities
details:
noun
- profane or obscene expression usually of surprise or anger
= synonyms: oath
- an evil spell
= example: an evil spell
= synonyms: hex
- an appeal to some supernatural power to inflict evil on someone or some group
= synonyms: condemnation
- a severe affliction
= synonyms: torment
- something causing misery or death
= synonyms: scourge
verb
- to utter obscenities or profanities
= example: to utter obscenities or profanities
= synonyms: cuss, swear, imprecate, blaspheme
- to wish harm upon
= synonyms: damn
- to heap obscenities upon
= example: to heap obscenities upon
- to exclude from a church or a religious community
= synonyms: excommunicate, unchurch
